JOB DESCRIPTION: Looking for software developers for Java, Android, MEAN Stack and Front end development. BTech (CS/IT/EC/EE) and MCA Freshers can apply. 2020, 2019, 2018 and 2017 freshers can also apply.Candidate should have a passion for software development

EDUCATION.UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Electrical, Electronics/Telecommunication, Instrumentation, Computers
EDUCATION.PG: MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Computers
EDUCATION.DOCTORATE: Doctorate Not Required, Any Doctorate in Any Specialization
